item.title: 泰国货币飙升为何与经济引力背道而驰
item.description: 泰铢对美元的年度涨幅正创下八年来的最大值。乍看之下，泰铢相对于本地区其他国家的表现似乎并无太大理由。泰国的经济远非强劲，旅游业低迷、家庭债务高企以及对美国出口征收 19% 的关税都拖累了泰国的经济。【原文：The Thai baht is heading for its biggest annual gain against the US dollar in eight years. At first glance, there seems to be little to justify its outperformance against regional peers. Thailand’s economy is far from robust, weighed down by sluggish tourism, high household debt and a 19% tariff on exports to the US.】
